name: The cosmic camera.
description:
Sadly this can be finished in a few minutes. I wouldn't recommend downloading this as it is unfinished.

Controls:

W/A/S/D - movement

1 - check video files

M - Record camera

Mouse scroll - swap between camera and flashlight 

Left click - pickup camera

Combat:

Kill the enemy with your flashlight after they get to their location. I meant to add a lot more here but had to cut a few things. 

Credits:

My friend made a wonderful 3D character model but I did not get to use it just yet, will update the game next week with it.

@greenman4890

https://greenman4890.itch.io/  

Ultra dynamic sky

Textures/trees/foliage from megascans
